applications

Class WordTrackerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • applications.WordTrackerManager

  • public class WordTrackerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    WordTrackerManager.java
    Version:
    1.0 Class Description: This class manages the execuion of the WordTracker program. It parses command-line arguments, initializes the WordTracker instance, processes input files, generates word reports based on user options, and serializes/deserializes the word tree to/from a binary file.
    Author:
    Jiyeon Heo, Tze-chi Chan, and Parinthorn Songsana

      private void loadProcessedFiles()

      Parses command-line arguments to extract input file name, user option, and output file name.
      void runWordTracker()
      Executes the WordTracker program by initializing a WordTracker instance, processing the input file, generating word reports, and serializing the word tree to a binary file

    • Method Detail

      • parseArguments

        public void parseArguments(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parses command-line arguments to extract input file name, user option, and output file name. Displays an error message and exits the program if the arguments are invalid.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments passed to the program.

      • loadProcessedFiles

        private void loadProcessedFiles()
        Loads processed files from the 'res/processedFiles.txt' file.

        Saves processed files to the 'res/processedFiles.txt' file.

      • runWordTracker

        public void runWordTracker()
        Executes the WordTracker program by initializing a WordTracker instance, processing the input file, generating word reports, and serializing the word tree to a binary file
